subject: RE: [junit] Non unit tests (package tests and sample client use tests)
msgSnippet: ... Sorry, can t help you with your original question. But for sample usage code you might want to take a look at http://www.jdemo.de/ Take care, Ilja -- ++
messageBody:
Ray Tayek wrote:
> Hi, fairly new to junit testing, I have this package where
> each class has a corresponding test case class. I ended up
> making a packeage test case that ran all the rest as well as
> some of it's own. I find myself writing a sample usage
> (outside the package) - something a client would do or use as
> an example or maybe to load test. So I made this guy run the
> package test and then his own tests. Seems like we will end
> up with some kind of hierarchy of tests.

Sorry, can't help you with your original question.

But for "sample usage code" you might want to take a look at
http://www.jdemo.de/

Take care, Ilja

--
